title: Avocado Panini with Brie, Mozzarella, Sun Dried Tomatoes, and Basil Recipe
full_text:
Avocado Panini with Brie, Mozzarella, Sun Dried Tomatoes, and Basil Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
10 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
15 mins
Serves
2
to 4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
(
12-inch
)
ciabatta
, halved horizontally
4
teaspoons
olive oil
or
sundried tomato olive oil
4 3/4
ounces
fresh sliced mozzarella
3 3/4
ounces
sliced brie
12
sundried tomatoes
8
big
basil leaves
1
Hass avocado,
sliced or mashed
Squirt
of
lemon juice
Salt
Freshly cracked black pepper
Directions
Drizzle the insides of both halves of bread with oil. Arrange the mozzarella on the bottom half, and the brie on the top half. Fill the inside with sundried tomato, basil leaves, and avocado. Season the avocado with a squirt of lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Stack the two halves into a sandwich, and put on a hot panini press for about 10 minutes, until the bread is crusty, and the cheese is melted. Cut into quarters and eat hot!
Special equipment
panini press
Sandwiches
Brie
Avocado
